file_insights.primary_responsibility: GET endpoint for fetching single project details

patterns_discovered: Async error handling in API routes
Function composition for project status determination
gotchas_discovered: Async params destructuring with Promise type
Handling potential undefined or invalid project IDs
Enriching project data with asynchronous Git information
Fallback error responses for various failure scenarios
recommendations: Add input validation middleware for project ID
Implement caching mechanism for project scans
Consider adding pagination or limit for project scanning
Add more granular logging for error tracking
Create unit and integration tests for the new endpoint
